body.para: On Wed, May 28, 2003 at 02:18:29PM -0500, Kevin Corry wrote:

quote.quotepara: On Tuesday 29 April 2003 08:55, Alasdair G Kergon wrote:

We're almost ready to release version 3 of the ioctl interface now, as per CVS head. The changes are designed to improve the flexibility and efficiency of the use of the interface, and at the same time address a few problems that showed up in the original version.
I was just wondering if you have a timeframe in mind for when the new ioctl interface will be officially released and when it will be sent to Linus for including in 2.5.

body.para: Shortly after it stops changing. It's on akpms 'must-fix' list, so there's a lot of pressure to do it soon.
